citation.article-title: Proposal of Sporolactobacillus nakayamae subsp. nakayamae sp. nov., subsp. nov., Sporolactobacillus nakayamae subsp. racemicus subsp. nov. Sporolactobacillus terrae sp. nov., Sporolactobacillus kofuensis sp. nov., Sporolactobacillus lactosus sp. nov.

p.s: Description of Sporolactobacillus nakayamae subsp. racemicus subsp. nov.
Sporolactobacillus nakayamae subsp. racemicus (ra.ce.mi'cus. L. n. racemus, rotatory of lactic acid racemi, [rotatory]-lactic acid)
Acid is produced from galactose, maltose, melibiose, sucrose, raffinose, trehalose, and inulin, but not from arabinose, ribose, and xylose.
The DNA G+C content ranges from 43 to 46 mol% (as determined by the Tm method).
The type strain is strain M-17 (= JCM 3417).
The other strains examined are strains M-13, M-96, and M-98.
